items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom will be in his office tomorrow morning.
Tom wanted to go outside and play with the other children.
Tom was in an accident and is now in a hospital in Boston.
Tom was making a sandwich when Mary came into the kitchen.
Tom went to the police station to file an accident report.
When did you begin to suspect that the suicide was staged?
I think people should stop using disposable shopping bags.
What would you like to do while you\'re here in Australia?
What\'s the spookiest thing that has ever happened to you?
It was careless of you to leave your umbrella in the taxi.
